product_name: BOB Handlebar Console with Tire Pump
long_description: Decked out with a pump and compatible with all BOB single strollers and the BOB Motion, this handlebar console keep stroller tires inflated, beverages insulated and items organized.
short_description: Decked out with a pump and compatible with all BOB single strollers and the BOB Motion, this handlebar console keep stroller tires inflated, beverages insulated and items organized.
